memberdef.name: ops
memberdef.initializer:
= { finch_xfer_new_xfer, finch_xfer_destroy, finch_xfer_add_xfer, finch_xfer_update_progress, finch_xfer_cancel_local, finch_xfer_cancel_remote,
NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL }

detaileddescription.para: Creates a new file transfer dialog.
Displays the file transfer dialog given. If dialog isNULL, displays the default dialog, creating one if necessary
Adds a file transfer to the dialog.
Removes a file transfer from the dialog.
Indicate in a file transfer dialog that a transfer was cancelled.

parameterdescription.para: The file transfer that was cancelled.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the information for a transfer in the dialog.
Initializes the GNT file transfer system.
Uninitializes the GNT file transfer system.
Returns the UI operations structure for the GNT file transfer UI.

simplesect.para: The GNT file transfer UI operations structure.
